Welcome & Intro Pages
Getting Started

New to Brightspace?

If this is your first course with Michigan Virtual, or if it has been a while since you engaged in online learning, we prepared a quick course navigation overview for you.

View Course Navigation Overview

You can decide how often you want to receive course-related emails or texts from the system (in-course announcements, grades, discussion posts, etc.)

Configure Your Notification Settings

Help & Support

All items from the Help & Support section are available to you through the navigation on the course homepage. From any spot in the course, select "Back to Content" in the upper left corner to get to the course homepage, and then select your desired content by clicking "Help & Support." There you'll find further information such as:

  • Netiquette
  • Technology Requirements
  • Technical Requirements
  • Accessibility Information
  • SCECH Policies

Something Wrong?

Is there a feature of the course that isn't performing as you might expect, such as a broken link or a graded item not registering? Please reach out to our Customer Care Team and include the course title and page link, if possible, so that we might resolve the issue as quickly as possible for you.

Personalized Help

Didn't find the information you were looking for? If you need help at any point in time, our Customer Care Team is devoted to answering your questions and providing you with the support you need.


Get Help
